name: ListSourceTrackingLinks
description:
Retrieve all source custom tracking links.

Fetches a list of all custom tracking links used for source tracking, requiring the 'hiringProcessMetadataRead' permission.

parameters.name: include_disabled_tracking_links
parameters.description: Set to true to include disabled tracking links in the list.

value_schema.description: When true, includes disabled tracking links

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API

parameters.name: includeDisabled
parameters.description: When true, includes disabled tracking links

value_schema.description: When true, includes disabled tracking links
